title: Immemorial Sword Venerable - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: 青石细语
description: This is the story of a man and a sword! The red dust is three thousand feet, and the glass is dyed with fragrance. The group of men competed in a deer, and the sword was in the palm of the hand. The true meaning of the sword, the secret of the immortality, recasting the road to heaven with the blood and refining the sword scriptures with hundreds of millions of lives. Everything is in the ancient swords.>
